quest.name: A New Ruby Tithe
journal: Yugiri is troubled by what she has seen.
Before you and your comrades can settle upon a new course of action, Yugiri grows tense. Men in armor are approaching. She urges you and Lyse to come with her and find a place to hide.

From the shadows of a building you observe as a squadron of soldiers marches into Namai, led by the selfsame pilus who threatened Tansui in the Ruby Sea. He tells the gathered people of the battle between Confederate and imperial forces in Isari, declaring it a brazen, unconscionable act that will not go unanswered. Announcing that some will be required to serve the Garleans in rudimentary support roles for an indeterminate period of time, the pilus prior begins to select villagers one by one, ending with Isse, the young man who implored you to leave Namai and never return. Powerless to intervene without endangering the lives of the villagers, you and your comrades can only watch as the soldiers depart with their hostages.

After Yugiri convinces Lyse to return to the House of the Fierce to inform the others of this development, the ninja turns to you and states that you must hurry if you are to catch up to the soldiers.

Calling a halt, Yugiri reminds you that for the sake of the villagers, you must make every effort to refrain from needless violence. To that end, she furnishes you with a blowgun and darts that you can use to put imperial soldiers to sleep. One stands alone on a hill to the south─an ideal opportunity for practice.

The dart finds its mark, and the soldier crumples to the ground without a sound. Satisfied, Yugiri directs you to another vantage point from where you can take aim at the remaining soldiers in the unit.
Soon the ground is littered with snoring soldiers, and your path is clear to cross the river and rejoin Yugiri northwest of Fluminis.

Yugiri applauds your handiwork, and informs you that the soldiers in the nearby castrum remain unaware of your presence. Several guard the gate, and once more the ninja invites you to use your blowgun to incapacitate them while she stands watch for wayward patrols.
The sentries are dispatched as easily as those before them. You put away your blowgun and descend the hill to rejoin your comrade.
Free to advance, you and Yugiri approach the gates to Fluminis cautiously, uncertain what awaits you beyond the threshold...

Joined by people taken from other nearby villages, the people of Namai listen in disbelief as the pilus tells them that they will be tasked with the repair and maintenance of arms and armaments, as well as magitek devices. Needless to say, it would take years before they perform such duties effectively, and it finally dawns on the gathered Domans that they have been effectively sentenced to a life of servitude. The pilus departs for the castle, leaving the villagers in the care of his subordinates. You must act quickly if you are to save them, for once they are transported to the facility on the distant shore, there is no escape...
objectives: Speak with Yugiri and use your blowgun to incapacitate the imperial soldier.
Take aim and use your blowgun to incapacitate the imperial soldiers.
Take aim and use your blowgun to incapacitate the imperial soldiers.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: There's got to be something we can do, right? We can't just give up and go home. Not after everything we've been through.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...Despite everything we have seen and learned, I refuse to renounce this cause.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We should return to the House of the Fierce and consult with our comrades. Perhaps together, we might─

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Did you hear that? Quickly, we must find a place to hide!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Is someone coming? I didn't hear anything.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Behind me, Forename! They come from the south!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Regardless of what the officer claimed, I fear they have crueler designs for these people.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: With me, Forename. We must hurry!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Given the circumstances, we must make every effort to refrain from needless violence.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Here. It is a shinobi's tool, for when a more discreet approach is required. Use it with these darts. They are coated with an alchemical reagent that induces a deep sleep.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: There are soldiers patrolling ahead. Were circumstances different we could engage them directly, but for the villagers' sake we dare not risk it.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We will use our blowguns to incapacitate them. For a shinobi such as you, this should prove no challenge. Nevertheless, practice is in order...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We will use our blowguns to incapacitate them. Regardless of your familiarity with such weapons, you are a veteran warrior, and I am sure it will come naturally to you. Nevertheless, practice is in order...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: There─the soldier on the hill below. Take aim and fire─if the dart finds its mark, he should fall within moments.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search your surroundings for the imperial soldier. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the soldier and use the blowgun with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Well done, my friend! Now, give me your map─there is a vantage point from which you may observe and fire upon the other soldiers.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Worry not─I shall be with you every step of the way, keeping watch for other patrols. We shall speak again on the other side of the river.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The last imperial soldier crumples to the ground, asleep. You put away your blowgun and prepare to rejoin Yugiri.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA02495
dialogue.text: Huh. Who are you? Some wandering merchant? Whatever it is, I don't want any. Piss off.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB02495
dialogue.text: This is no place for the likes of you. Begone!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Excellent work, Forename. They appear to be none the wiser...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The villagers are being held in the castrum to the south─Fluminis.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Once, it was the base of operations for the Garlean occupation...until ten or so years ago, when they relocated to Doma Castle. Now, the castrum serves as little more than a storage facility...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I spy two sentries near the gate. As you have proven yourself to have impeccable aim, I would ask you to incapacitate them. This very hill should afford you a clear shot.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I will stand watch while you see to the guards. Climb the hill and use your blowgun to put them to sleep!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The two sentries slumber side by side. No others appear to be forthcoming...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Fine work, Forename. Oboro would be proud.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Fine work, Forename. You have a gift for the ways of the shinobi...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The way is clear─let us move closer and see what has become of the villagers.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: (-Imperial Decurion-)Sir! The Aan from the other villages are assembled for inspection.

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: Very good. I will address them personally.

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: Attention! Shortly you all will be transported to the facility on the distant shore.

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: Your duties, as you have been previously informed, will be rudimentary in nature. More specifically, you will be tasked with the repair and maintenance of various arms and armaments, as well as magitek devices.

dialogue.name: VILLAGER02495
dialogue.text: Magitek!? But we're farmers! We don't know the first thing about magitek!

dialogue.name: VILLAGER02495
dialogue.text: It'd take us months, if not years, to learn how to do that kind of work!

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: The materiel in question was damaged when your kith and kin rose up in rebellion! Therefore, you bear responsibility for its repair!

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: If you cannot perform your duties, you will learn how. And if you cannot learn how, then your villages may find themselves at the mercy of the Confederacy and other radical elements. Is that what you want?

dialogue.name: GARLEANLEADERDOMA
dialogue.text: Deal with this rabble. I am needed at the castle.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: This is no temporary measure. Those men and women will die in servitude.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Once they are taken to the other facility, it will be too late. If we are to intervene, we must do so now. Agreed?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Then let us be about it.
